name: geoserver.bukidnon.gov.ph/geoserver/web/
description: Geospatial data catalog for Bukidnon, Philippines, hosted by the province's official GeoServer, providing access to web mapping services and geospatial information.

data_themes.data_theme: INSPIRE themes or similar (if not, assign 'Other', or best match from DCAT-AP list)
data_themes.note: Data includes geospatial layers relevant to environmental and geographic mapping.

geotopics.note: Spatial datasets for administrative, topographic, and environmental mapping.
